Detailed Description

This implements the TerrainTextureLayer interface for the second generation terrain.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TerrainTextureLayer2::TerrainTextureLayer2 ( CommonTerrainBlock2 &  terrainBlock,
uint32  blendWidth = 0,
uint32  blendHeight = 0 
) [explicit]

This is the TerrainTextureLayer2 constructor.

Parameters:
terrainBlock The underlying TerrainBlock2.
blendWidth The width of the blend, or 0 to use the current terrain settings
blendHeight The height of the blend, or 0 to use the current terrain settings

std::string *  error = NULL 
) [virtual]
